The time to buy $TSLA will be when the amateurs have been wiped out, the promoters have moved on, company officers are purchasing shares with their own money, and nobody else you know owns shares.

Those signals are more important than price.

Indeed the price of the stock might well double from here, I do not have an opinion on the short term price movement. 

However as my longtime followers know, I remain very bearish the stock price (not the company) and wary of the online personalities who promote the stock.
$TSLA

A few people have asked how I see $TSLA playing out.

I should start with saying this: Tesla is an excellent company with fantastic automobiles and a wonderful balance sheet.

This commentary focuses on the *stock* and I am well aware some conflate the stock and the products.
